001package edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.adapter;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.view.LayoutInflater;
005import android.view.View;
006import android.view.ViewGroup;
007import android.widget.ArrayAdapter;
008import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
009import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
010import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.R;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.databinding.ItemSwatchesBinding;
012
013public class SwatchesAdapter extends ArrayAdapter<String> {
014
015  private final LayoutInflater inflater;
016  private final int[] colorValues;
017
018  public SwatchesAdapter(@NonNull Context context) {
019    super(context, R.layout.item_swatches, context.getResources().getStringArray(R.array.color_names));
020    inflater = LayoutInflater.from(context);
021    colorValues = context.getResources().getIntArray(R.array.color_values);
022  }
023
024  @NonNull
025  @Override
026  public View getView(int position, @Nullable View convertView, @NonNull ViewGroup parent) {
027    return getView(position, convertView, parent, View.GONE);
028  }
029
030  @Override
031  public View getDropDownView(int position, @Nullable View convertView, @NonNull ViewGroup parent) {
032    return getView(position, convertView, parent, View.VISIBLE);
033  }
034
035  @NonNull
036  private View getView(int position, @Nullable View convertView,
037      @NonNull ViewGroup parent, int labelVisibility) {
038    ItemSwatchesBinding binding = (convertView == null)
039        ? ItemSwatchesBinding.inflate(inflater, parent, false)
040        : ItemSwatchesBinding.bind(convertView);
041    binding.swatch.setColorFilter(colorValues[position]);
042    binding.label.setText(getItem(position));
043    binding.label.setVisibility(labelVisibility);
044    return binding.getRoot();
045  }
046
047}
